name: Offroad Stunt Bike rider 2018
description:
Offroad stunt bike racing is the best moto stunt racing games on the store. Bike stunt racing game is extremely challenging and adventurous game for furious stunt rider and high jump lovers. This tricky bike race game is very exciting and best time killer for supermoto racing bikers. Bike stunt racing - offroad tricks master mania is all about controlling, balancing and performing crazy motorcycle stunts with your heavy bike against different jumps, ramps, barrels and other obstacles.

Every mission is more exciting and challenging than the other missions of the crazy off-road stunts game. This is the perfect time for tricky motorbike race and performing bike attack crazy stunts unlike other tricky bike stunt games 2017. You have to show your professional motorcycle driving tricks to compete for extremely tough challenges for accomplishing all missions in this irresponsible bike stunt game of 2018.
You have to ride your bike and go through all tricky obstacles in the mud as crazy bike rider for completing the race in the limited time. Try the extreme adventure on two-wheel bike simulator on the highway offroad bike riding game. Variety of latest motorbikes are available in store you have to ride maximum for earning points to unlock the more advanced heavy bikes for riding on impossible tracks of mud and asphalt. Ride your dirt bike in extreme situations for becoming professional traffic rider. Ultimate street bike stunt master racer is a game for experienced road traffic rider on dirt tracks of the impossible road. As the acceleration button is pressed then motto bike start driving very fast and almost uncontrollable for the new driver, when you feel your heavy bike is going out of control then you must press brake button to reduce the speed of dirt bike to avoid accident and any emergency situation because no rescue service is available to save you in this racing on bike game.
So are you ready for becoming bmx stuntman bike rider in the real-life physics bike racer game of motor age? The realistic booster will boost your dirt bike high jump and you would fly while crossing the incline ramp and you will forget other motorcycle games of moto hill stunt bikes. Realistic environment, sunny and snowy weather, genuine sounds, HD graphics and much more make this game more amusing, addictive and best time killer among all motorbike games.
Be an extreme dirt bike rider of the motorbike to perform bang stunt by crossing all the hurdles placed on off road bike tracks, you have to be very professional for playing superhero motorcycle challenge which is different from other stunt bike games. Bike stunt racing missions get harder as the time pass with deadly ramps, mega hurdles, zig zag obstacles etc. so drive your stunt bike with much care for avoiding any emergency situation on crazy impossible tracks.
It's time to master bike go stunt game by driving heavy bike-motorcycle across giant ramps in mid of tricky track roads of moto racer. Breathtaking high jumps give the realistic feelings of acrobatic gt bike stunt driving experience. If you are bored then you must try this trial bike stunts game and climb up on dangerous mountains.

Features of Offroad Stunt Bike rider 2018
• Multiple luxurious heavy and trail bikes
• Extreme stunts
• Deadly obstacles
• Snow mode and sunny mode
• Multiple controls e.g. tilt and button controls
• Multiple challenging missions
• Real Physics controls on all bikes
• Graphics quality settings
• Different bikes can be purchased from store
• Offline game play
• Real 3D modern city environment
• HD graphics
• Bike meter
• Bike Nozzle for extreme jumping
• Amusing sounds

Don’t waste your time by searching bike racing games just go the store and type offroad stunt bike rider 2018 for ultimate fun, extreme challenge and excitement for free.
